question: I don’t have a SSx can I still submit an application for Virginia's Insurance Marketplace coverage?
text:
I dont have a SSx can I still submit an application for Virginia's Insurance Marketplace coverage?
          
        
YES. You can submit your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application even if you do not have an SSx. Some applicants, including those who are lawfully present and/or non-citizens, could be lawfully present and not have a SSx. In these cases, the SSx field should be left blank.
Please do not enter an Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) in this field.
You will then be asked to verify that you have an eligible immigration status by indicating the document you can provide and including specific information from that document.
Please do not enter an Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) in this field.
NOTE:
Anyone applying for coverage, or adults included on the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application but not applying for coverage, are required to provide a SSx if they have one. All household members are encouraged to provide a SSx if they have one to prevent any delays in the eligibility determination and enrollment process.
